Package me.itzloghotxd.pdk.utilities.chat

Class ChatUtilities

java.lang.Object
me.itzloghotxd.pdk.utilities.chat.ChatUtilities
public final class ChatUtilities extends Object
A utility class for sending formatted chat messages to players and command senders in a Bukkit-based server. This class provides methods to send different types of messages, including information, warnings, and errors.
Author:
ItzLoghotXD
